command.description.fun.higherlower: Play a game of higher or lower!
command.description.fun.reddit: Get a random post from a subreddit.
command.description.moderation.ban: Ban a user from the server.
command.description.moderation.clear: Clear a certain amount of messages.
command.description.moderation.kick: Kick a user from the server.
command.description.moderation.note: Add a note to a user.
command.description.moderation.removeinf: Remove an infraction from a user.
command.description.utility.support: Get an invite link to the support server.
command.description.utility.urban: Search the Urban Dictionary for a term.
command.description.xp.calculate: Calculate the amount of XP and time you need to reach a certain level.
command.description.xp.toggleserverlevel: Toggle the server's level up messages.
command.description.xp.top: Get the top 10 users on the server.
